Package gameObjects.characters.fighters

Class Fighter

java.lang.Object
gameObjects.GameObject
gameObjects.characters.Entity
gameObjects.characters.fighters.Fighter
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameLogic
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnemyFighter, PlayerFighter
public class Fighter
extends Entity
The Class Fighter. This class is for all fighters in the fight scenes
